place_description: My Story Cafe is a coffee shop in Charlotte, NC. Our experienced staff provides friendly and prompt service for a remarkable cafe experience. We value our customers and strive to satisfy your coffee cravings by serving you our cafe's best and tastiest recipes. Our coffee shop is the perfect place to meet with family and friends. We are friendly and care about your experience at our cafe. We are confident that one visit will satisfy your cravings and give you an unforgettable day.

reviews_data.review_text: Lynn was great and hospitable! Service was quick and my Matcha Boba & danish were delicious. Only downside is the space is a little small - thankfully, I was solo that day but I'd say all in all the shop only has 8 seats so just be aware of that if it gets busy. Since it's in the Alley though, you could find seating outside or at the park across the street. Also, street parking is really rare so you may have to circle the area a bit to find a place to park if you don't want to pay for a garage. All in all, the shop is so cute and has some nice vibes and treats!
Stopped here during a layover through Charlotte based on Google reviews and it didn't disappoint! The owner is warm and lovely, she makes you feel at home. Great place to sit and work.
Little peace of Heaven

Loooove this place! One of the best cappuccinos I have had outside of Paris! Love the laid back vibe and Jaqueline the owner / barista is such a beautiful soul!
I definitely will come back when I'm in Charlotte!

What a picture perfect little place! We were in Charlotte for the Cruz Azul vs Charlotte FC game and decided to find a boba tea place. It did not disappoint! We got the Taro milk tea and the strawberry milk tea and they were both really good. The desserts looked really good but we only got drinks this time.
I got a couple drinks with my friend today. We were greeted by a nice lady who made our orders. The drinks were excellent :))
Adorable cozy coffee shop tucked away in the French Quarter of Charlotte...super friendly owner! Definitely recommend!

You don't want to miss this wonderful gem, snuggled deep in the French Quarters in Uptown Charlotte.  My friend and I were looking for a "coffee experience " and we got it.  From the time we entered to when we received our drinks, it was service with warmth and a smile. The owner, Jackie, sat down and engaged us in delightful conversation, which made the time there, even more memorable.  I had the French toast latte, Yum!  The shop was cozy, like having tea on a front porch.  The menu includes Cuban coffee, Italian drinks, and Vietnamese coffee-to name a few.  You must go!  This will be my go to spot!  Thank you for a great time and coffee "experience
Had the best Cuban Espresso here, a true gem in the heart of Charlotte.
Great boba, friendly.
Jackie was amazing and she let me try the Vietnamese coffee fresh brewed and oh my word it was delicious! She is so kind and generous and accommodating. Go try the coffee and support local.
Such a cute shop with amazing drinks and amazing vibes. Both of the women that helped me were very kind and the boba I had was delicious.
3 stars for the cute little coffee shop. Overpriced and the cappuccino and latte with oat milk had no foam, tasted like burnt, cheap oat milk. Should've asked for a refund.

The name "My Story Cafe" peeked my curiosity as I searched for the best nearby cafe sua da experience. Traveled the NE, SE and Midwest regions visiting  64 locations but #65 was the absolute best. Thank you for the best cafe sua da I have ever sipped.  See you soon, Chef Blondee Peace & Luv  I am...
omg! cutest Coziest place in the World.
Love the drinks here! The owner is so sweet too!

Came in for a quick coffee to get my day started and wasn't disappointed! I grabbed the Vietnamese iced coffee and it didn't disappoint!

Look for Jacquelyn, she'll take care of you :)

This is the most charming Cafe ever. The owner is kind and engaging and the Milk Tea is superb! They now have daily fresh baked French  Pastries: twice baked croissants, sweet cream cinnamon rolls, and bursting blueberry muffins to name a few. Its located 120 Brevard Court in the French Quarter Village in Uptown Charlotte, its such a welcoming experience.
Cute spot & yummy smoothie

Such delicious coffee! And the Vietnamese coffee especially was great. Cute place, nice atmosphere, and the lady working there was so nice and went the extra mile on everything.
Thank you!

Wish I could give this spot TEN stars, a HUNDRED stars!!! Every time I come in, it's like visiting home. Over the past year working in Uptown, coming here on my breaks has been the highlight of each week. Incredible atmosphere, personality, and of course not to mention the drinks and snacks! Personally, I'm a huge fan of the french toast latte or any of the fruit smoothies with popping boba. I've always felt that the price is fair, the drinks are delicious and packed with flavor (and plenty of boba), and the desserts are always moist and fresh!!!! A million times over, thank you thank you thank you! My favorite independent cafe in all of charlotte, located in the heart of Uptown! The owner is extremely kind hearted, and will always ensure your experience at her establishment is a great one. Can't reccomend this place enough :-)
My story cafe is an amazing place to do work, read a book, and chat with a friend. The drinks are to die for at this shop. Please come check this establishment out.
Wondering uptown before dinner and found this lovely place. Energetic, authentic staff and amazing Vietnamese coffee! Wish I lived closer, because this would be a daily stop!
Best Vietnamese coffee I've ever had. Great recommendation from staff, they even came out to look for us afterwards to check and see how we liked it!
Good smoothies and tea, and great service and people. Very sweet.

Best in Charlotte! Full stop. Each cup of coffee is authentic and rich in flavor. A must try in uptown / latte arcade. Pastries don't discount either. The owner and staff are kind and knowledgeable. The atmosphere is comfortable and laid back. Can't recommend enough.

My wife and I traveled to Charlotte on a business trip  and we some coffee other than Starbucks. We found this nice shop "My Story Cafe". The coffee was really great! I definitely recommend to all the coffee lovers who prefer quality coffee
A cozy space to write. Owner is a lovely entrepreneur with a story to tell. Great beverage choices, there is a small library and soft padded bench to sit on.
Perfect service.. The Vietnamese iced coffee is the best! 10 out of 10
Delicious, cozy, and welcoming!
Great little coffee shop we stumbled upon while trying to avoid starbucks, coffee and service was excellent
What a wonderfully cute cafe serving up some great coffee! Jaclyn was so welcoming and friendly! I will definitely be back to get more coffee and treats.
Best Vietnam coffee everrrrrr get it cold and yummmmmmmm

I've heard others rave about this coffee shop so I decided to give it a try while in the area. Customer service 10/10 and drink (French toast latte) was amazing. I will definitely be returning next time I'm in the area!

Loved the plants as soon as we walked in early on a Saturday morning. The owner was very nice, friendly, and patient. My daughter could not make up her mind what kind of boba tea to get so having patience was greatly appreciated. The drinks were delicious. Thank you.

I loved spending time at this little cafe. The atmosphere was very relaxing and the employees and owners were beyond kind.
I got a strawberry banana smoothie that was so rich and creamy 10/10. I'm sad that I am not a local because this would definitely be a regular stop for me!
Love this coffee shop! Such a nice quaint setup and Jackie is always so amazing!!
Definitely try their Vietnamese ice coffee, what a treat
So amazing. Food is delicious, atmosphere is comfortable, waiter is very friendly
Wonderful local coffee shop - great atmosphere and good coffee. Totally recommend it!

Got the brown sugar "milk tea" with boba. It was okay and the boba was cooked well, Just way over priced for what you're getting. Usually one drink with boba will be around $7, at this place a drink starts at 7.50, toppings are an additional $1 (and they don't even give you but like 10 boba as you can see from my picture) and with tax you're out over $9 for a drink.....and on top of this, I found out they don't even use any tea in their "milk teas". I was told it is milk with flavored syrup of choice (aka taro syrup, brown sugar, etc). With this info I think it is even more outrageous they charge $9 a cup....please work on this. Won't be back sadly....
I got the Taro with boba. Boba is an additional dollar, it's way overcooked and mush. You get a very small amount and it tastes honestly terrible. The taro drink itself was okay.

This place is a cozy little hidden secret in the heart of the city. The owner was very attentive and caring. I ordered myself a French toast latte and like the owner warm personality it was definitely a highlight. Can't wait to visit soon!
Very nice good pleasant place

Stopped by for a coffee on a cold Saturday. Ended up spending about an hour enjoying my coffee and staying out of the cold. Great coffee, atmosphere & customer service. Highly recommend stopping by for a coffee and relaxing!

Owner is really nice and trying her best. Help her out!!
Excellent service

The service was great, the workers were very nice and funny. The drinks were done in under 5 minutes and they tasted amazing. The price was a bit expensive, however, it's expected because of the location.
She's very sweet!!! She makes the best Taro!

This is such a beautiful atmosphere with amazing service. The pastries were delightful and the coffee has amazingly rich flavours. The owner engaged in conversation with us and helped us know where in the city to visit.
Fun little cafe tucked out of the way. Wonderful service, sit down and sip Vietnamese coffee or grab a French Toast Latte to go. You won't be upset. Cheers!

Me and my friends go every time we're on college break together. We were some of the first customers to ever enter the shop when it first opened the other year. The owner and her staff are so sweet and down to earth, the tea is awesome a bit on the pricey side in others opinion but it's worth it with the service.
Very cute little spot in the QC.  Worth checking out.  Grab a little snack and a drink and chill.
Love it!

It's a cozy place so beautiful and delightful. The host is very friendly and she makes you feel welcomed.  I recommend this place 100%.  The Vietnamese coffee is so good also the hot chocolate and the Taro drink is so good and different. If you want to try something new you need to try this beverage.
my boyfriend and i tried the Vietnamese iced coffee and iced matcha! both were so good. it was a great first stop on our trip to charlotte!
Take a minute to find this place. What a beautiful soul. The place is cozy and welcoming. And try the peanut punch. Brought me back to my childhood. I wish her all the best
An awesome coffee shop in the middle of Charlotte!
Jacqueline is such an incredible and beautiful spirit. The Vietnamese ice Coffee is a must. Be sure to add the sea salt cream foam!
Didn't catch the main ladies name but super kind and gave recommendation on what to get! Coffee is amazing !
You must try the Vietnamese iced coffee!!! It's out of this WORLD!! So so good. I loved the service, the vibe, everything. An easy 5 stars!
Great coffee and even better atmosphere! Definitely recommend

I wanted to find a good strong cup of coffee before heading to the art museum and found this lovely cafe. I had Cuban coffee and sat by the window.  It's a cozy place. The owner is very kind. I look forward to visiting again and bringing my family next time.
Nice and Cozy for an all natural beverage. Must try the Lychee.
Great Customer Service, and the drinks are refreshing and unique. I got an extra boost of energy from the Lychee drinks. This is a must visit to Uptown, when one come to Charlotte, NC
This is the most magical coffee I've ever ingested

My friend was so excited to take me here because she said they added boba to the coffee. I did see a sign that said so. I asked for a Caramel latte with boba and I received milk with caramel. I had to go and get the boba added which indeed was on the receipt. I had to deal with drinking boba with milk and caramel. Very disappointed, won't go back again.

My Story Cafe in Uptown Charlotte is an absolute gem! After an exhaustive search for an open coffee shop, my friend and I stumbled upon this charming place. Jaclyn, the owner, welcomed us with open arms and inspiring conversation. I savored the Vietnamese iced coffee, while my friend relished the hot chocolate. The warmth and homely atmosphere at Story Cafe made it an instant favorite. We've pledged to return every time we're in Charlotte. Kudos to Jaclyn and her wonderful cafe!
Amazing milk tea and a super friendly staff!
Beautiful little shop

Awesome little coffee shop. Found this place while visiting for work. After the first morning went back everyday, and brought my colleagues. Woman was very friendly and prided herself on the coffee. The coffee was better than anything one can get at a chain coffee place. Probably one of the best cups of coffee I've had in years.
Very pleasant place fast friendly

The owner Jacqueline is always pleasant and runs this cafe very well. Love the environment over there! It is very welcoming. Tressa was Amazing on my last visit. She recommended a Tea Refresher and it was great. The Peach flavor is the one that I got this time. I would recommend it to others on a hot day.

This little tea cafe is filled with vining plants along an exposed brick wall. There are a few tables inside and out as well as a cute mini lending library. The real draw, however, are the drinks and service. Stopped in to cool down with a pina colada smoothie and had the most delightful conversation with Tressa, the owner's fabulous assistant! Next time I definitely want to try the French toast latte and honeydew smoothie, but it's not just the drinks that will keep me coming back...it's the exceptional service and friendly conversation that truly make this place worth its while!!
Owner is so sweet. Vietnamese coffee is the best iced coffee I have ever had. Worth a visit.
Great experience, awesome drinks and costumer service is great. Love it here
workers were super sweet, friendly, and welcoming. cute little shop. i got a peach refresher and it was really good, just too expensive for what it was.

I had a terrible experience. My son dropped his drink and was scolded for it with no offer to make him a new one. Let alone the "milk tea" had no tea, it was simply milk and some syrup. My son's drink was barely mixed it looked like the syrup and milk were piled on top of each other and then he was expected to mix it himself, which was part of the reason it dropped. It's not like no one has ever dropped their drink before... The customer service was terrible and as someone who has worked many years in the service industry, I am so disgusted.

Gracious Owner. Nice, cozy, coffee/tea place. It's tucked away in the "French Quarter" alley across from Romare Bearden Park. Quaint atmodphere, read a book, chat with friends comfortably. Enjoy.peace.
Adorable cafe with the nicest owner. She makes an amazing honey latte
The owner was the sweetest ever! Please go for a chill vibe and Vietnamese iced coffee!! Ssoo delicious!!
Great owner, leaves you feeling welcomed/at home. She is very accommodating as well. This will be the spot whenever I am in town. Really glad I stopped by to support a woman owned business!!

Horrible experience. The smoothie was literally ice and milk and nasty flavored syrup. The worker took our orders and then took 30 minutes to make our smoothies and kept asking us what we got because she couldn't remember and made other people's orders before ours, even though we ordered way before them. Don't come here!!!
French toast late is the best drink ever. Nicest staff, they made my day. Let them make you a special drink and you won't regret it. Best coffee in NC.

One of my new favorite spots to grab a coffee in Uptown. The proprietor is extremely friendly and has already learned my order after only a couple of visits. Yes, it is a bit pricey, but you pay for the quality of drink and the experience.
Vietnamese coffee is a 10/10

The interior is cute and the owner was really nice. The tea was good, but really expensive to me ($7.50, ended up being $9.12 for a single drink after boba + tax). I got the Thai tea. They also have baked goods like muffins and cookies!
Perfect atmosphere
Owner and staff go above and beyond to make you feel welcome. It's not just a cafe. Hidden Jem in the city!
Best coffee shop in Uptown... Hands down!

At first sip my daughter whispered, "Oh my goodness!" By second sip- she was dancing! It was the Pina Colada (no alcohol) with added Boba that had her so excited, she began to jump in place (lol). She described her drink as "The best Boba I've tried! And, it has pineapple pieces, too!" It was a joy for me to watch; especially since she hadn't lit up like that in a while.

We discovered this new gem from a media outlet online. After reading it- I used it as a homeschooling lesson for my daughter to learn about another entrepreneur's business that operates in excellence, and is black woman owned! This opportunity was sweetened by today's in-person visit. The Owner was warm, welcoming, and created a personal experience for us to shop with & be served by the CEO! I could tell she appreciated us. My daughter already has plans to go back with her siblings! And, I'll happily return to treat myself.
Customer service was amazing and I love the drinks!
Live in Raleigh and always come here to get boba! 10/10

The owner and staff were wonderful!
I got the "peanut punch," I don't normally get drinks that are this flavour- but this was great!
Definitely recommend stopping by if you're in the area!
Great experience, cutest little coffee shop ever with the sweetest employee and owner. Coffee was amazing!!
People were so nice and made me feel very comfortable! I got the boba
The place looked different but other than that the drink's taste good
This store is amazing! Jacqeuline is so sweet and she has just started a library that is so beautiful!
Cutest coffee and boba shop! This would be a great place to bring a book and spend an afternoon. They even have a little library to borrow a book if you forgot yours.
Absolutely love my time here at my story cafe! I am new the Charlotte and stumbled across this place and will definitely be a repeat customer. Coffee is great and boba is even better!
Amazing, authentic Bobo tea! We will visit every time we come to town!!

Found this cafe on a rainy night when I was looking for something warm to drink and was pleasantly suprised. The owner was inviting and went out of her way to make my visit perfect. The coffee was excellent and the overall vibe was very calm and peaceful. I would definitely recommend this cafe if you're every looking for a quiet cup of coffee in a beautiful setting.
It was the best experience I have ever had the lady that owns the shop is amazing her smoothies are amazing I highly recommend this smoothie place if your ever in Charlotte

I used to frequent this place all the time back when it used to be Tea Fusion Uptown. It just hasn't been the same since the ownership and branding change. Prices have gone up and quality is noticeably lower. I'll be looking for a new favorite bubble tea place as this is not the one for me any more.
